text: Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto rukhayetʹsya vy cherez zemlyu ta more. Vy pryyizhdzhayete na korabelʹ, ta vony plavayutʹ hladko u krasyvomu vitertsi. Todi, toy chas, yak tishyvshysʹ tam, nasylʹnytsʹkyy viter stusany, ta khvyli otochuyutʹ yikh z kozhnoyi storony. Tse koly vony blahayutʹ BOHA, vidverto prysvyachuyuchi yikhni molytvy yomu yedyni: "Yakshcho Vy tilʹky ryatuyete tsey raz nas, my budemo vichno appreciative
